more.description: As a Juice Barista at Guanabana you will be trained to: -Make fruit and veggie smoothies to order -Prepare panini, salads, and cold pressed juice -Consult customers on smoothie nutrition and custom blends for smoothies, juices, and superfoods -Ensure high quality product and personalized service to each customer -Maintain company standards of sanitation, cleanliness, and professionalism -Carry out company procedures and guidelines
more.requirement: -Requires some F&B, retail, or hospitality experience. -English language skills preferred
